00001 //=============================================================================
00002 /*! _zgematrix*zcovector operator */
00003 inline _zcovector operator*(const _zgematrix& mat, const zcovector& vec)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const _zgematrix&, const zcovector&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(mat.N!=vec.L){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(const _zgematrix&, const zcovector&)"
00013               << std::endl
00014               << "These matrix and vector can not make a product." << std::endl
00015               << "Your input was (" << mat.M << "x" << mat.N << ") * ("
00016               << vec.L << ")." << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   zcovector newvec(mat.M);
00022   zgemv_( 'N', mat.M, mat.N, std::complex<double>(1.0,0.0), mat.Array, mat.M,
00023           vec.Array, 1, std::complex<double>(0.0,0.0), newvec.array, 1 );
00024   
00025   mat.destroy();
00026   return _(newvec);
00027 }
